Uses of Package
ch.lambdaj.group

  • Packages that use ch.lambdaj.group 
    Package Description
    ch.lambdaj  
    ch.lambdaj.collection  
    ch.lambdaj.group  
  • Classes in ch.lambdaj.group used by ch.lambdaj 
    Class and Description
    ArgumentGroupCondition
    A GroupCondition that allows to group items based on the value they have on a given argument
    Group
    A set of object (optionally hierarchically) grouped on the values of one or more of their properties
    GroupCondition
    Defines how a set of items should be grouped
  • Classes in ch.lambdaj.group used by ch.lambdaj.collection 
    Class and Description
    Group
    A set of object (optionally hierarchically) grouped on the values of one or more of their properties
    GroupCondition
    Defines how a set of items should be grouped
  • Classes in ch.lambdaj.group used by ch.lambdaj.group 
    Class and Description
    ArgumentGroupCondition
    A GroupCondition that allows to group items based on the value they have on a given argument
    Group
    A set of object (optionally hierarchically) grouped on the values of one or more of their properties
    GroupCondition
    Defines how a set of items should be grouped
    StringGroupCondition
    A GroupCondition that groups items based on the values they have on the named JavaBean property
